titleStmt.title: Seasonable words for English Protestants a sermon from Jer. 51, 5, setting forth, 1. When a land is filled with sin? 2. What evidences we have that England is not forsaken yet by God? and, 3. What is required of us, that we may not be given up to destruction.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

notesStmt.note: Written by Daniel Burgess. Cf. DNB.
Advertisements on p. 29 and [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
